name: Brooke Faucault-Welles
bio: fascinated by how communication technology shapes, changes, and transforms our relationships with one another. From small groups to whole societies, she uses computational and mixed-methods to understand how everyday people can use communication technology to create stronger communities and support human thriving.

name: Bryn Geffert
bio: is the dean of libraries at UVM with an additional appointment as a professor of history. He majored in history and in Russian, graduating summa cum laude from St. Olaf College, with breaks for study in Scotland and the Soviet Union, plus stints as a lifeguard and Red Cross swimming instructor.
